content: I'm actually planning to visit Legoland Windsor with my family soon, and I've been to the park before with my niece on August 5th. We attended the LEGO Friends Live Show at the LEGO City Stage, and we built our own LEGO creations at the LEGO Creative Workshop afterwards. Do you think the Q-bot system would be worth the extra cost for my family, considering we'll have kids with us?
